title: Pool party zac model bug?

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: Pool party zac color is dark blue than light blue  {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body:
Hey Eievu,

It looks like you're playing on lower graphics settings. As you lower the settings, layers of particles, textures, etc. will intentionally come off. Because of this, the spec tech map for the shiny look of Pool Party Zac will come off on lower settings. This is working as intended.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=81JAeN5I,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-13T04:30:56.759+0000)
>
> Hey Eievu,
> 
> It looks like you're playing on lower graphics settings. As you lower the settings, layers of particles, textures, etc. will intentionally come off. Because of this, the spec tech map for the shiny look of Pool Party Zac will come off on lower settings. This is working as intended.

Yea. I remember before I upgraded my comp, I thought that was just how the skin looked. Played him for the first time on max settings almost a month after upgrading and I'm just like, "Wooooooow preeeeety"

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=81JAeN5I,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-13T04:30:56.759+0000)
>
> Hey Eievu,
> 
> It looks like you're playing on lower graphics settings. As you lower the settings, layers of particles, textures, etc. will intentionally come off. Because of this, the spec tech map for the shiny look of Pool Party Zac will come off on lower settings. This is working as intended.

ah, thats why. forgot i got my character quality settings is on very low. thanks for telling me this. i feel bad for the players who bought this skin and have to play LoL on very low settings though.

Not trying to abuse the fact that you commented here, but while we're on the topic, was removing this feature of my W intentional?
" Zac also ignores unit collision against monsters damaged by Unstable Matter."
I'm part of the skins team, and unfortunately, have limited knowledge when it comes to these types of things. :c
